overview: This school year, the “Russian Institute” is teeming with new young girls in school uniforms. They show sexual aptitudes worthy of the most experienced students by voraciously embracing dicks and impaling themselves deeply on cocks and in welcoming seamen of these gentlemen on their angelic faces. At the head of these new little ladies, “Little Caprice” a true poster child of “lolitas” awaits you in a memorable scene where her way of sucking, of getting herself, but also of looking you in the eye will drive you directly to heaven. No doubt the courses of this new year of “Russian Institute” looks like it’ll be action-packed.
title: Russian Institute: Lesson 16 - Lolitas
